suggestions.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky and Marianne Costa
suggestions.description: rich and complex interpretations of the Marseille tarot

suggestions.title: Seeing The World

suggestions.description: a fascinating book by the restorer of the tarots of Dodal and Noblet, linking the tarot to the history of the Compagnons du Devoir

suggestions.author: Victor Tomberg
suggestions.description: a journey into Christian Hermeticism by one of its masters (and the source of the major arcana meditations on this site)

suggestions.title: The Pictorial Key to the Tarot

suggestions.description: Arthur Waite's explanations of Pamela Coleman Smith's ubiquitous tarot deck

suggestions.title: The Tarot: A Key to the Wisdom of the Ages
suggestions.author: Paul Foster Case
suggestions.description: Paul Case's reworking of the Waite-Smith deck with deeper Qabalistic insights
